The ea continued to refuse to visit but then attended meetings with the council and owners of the system, whilst excluding us whose land was being and still is being damaged.

@paulwarmo @dingdongdawson @DanRavenEllison @cerysmatthews @EnvAgency This is just a small domestic sewage system. Plenty of evidence has been submitted to demonstrate that works undertaken in nov 2019 didn't resolve all the defects. The reluctance of the ea is down to who the owner of the system is.
